body: What is it with these characters and their "I WILL GET YOU PREGNANT" yells? Who willingly signs up for 18 years of payments and bills like that???

@Sumo_x2 She would have rejected him, that's the whole point. Getting into it during the moment is one thing, choosing to start seeing someone sexually or even in a relationship is something completely different. Bro, did you even read it properly?

Why didn't the teacher just approach the MILF like a normal person, if she was gonna get into so quickly maybe he would've had a shot had he approached. But you see that's why she was written to be repulsed by him to negate that idea either way considering that again she fell for the dude after his "confession" it seems that he had a shot if he just put himself together. I guess what I'm saying is that the blackmail, apart from being cliché was also weak. But it was aight, it was fine.
